AI Description: Netlib LAPACK (Linear Algebra PACKage) is a widely-used library for numerical linear algebra. It provides routines for solving systems of simultaneous linear equations, least-squares solutions of linear systems of equations, eigenvalue problems, and singular value problems.
Core Features:
1. Linear equation solving
2. Least-squares solutions
3. Eigenvalue problems
4. Singular value problems
General Tags: Numerical Computing, Linear Algebra, Library, Numerical Analysis
